page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT IN GLADESTRY
page.content: In the past the people are mostly farmers or have worked on farms or rented farms from Lord Ormethwaite who owned the estate. Today there are 21 families in our school and 9 of them are farmers and 12 have other jobs 43% are farmers and 57% have other jobs so really theres more people with other jobs lots of people have come to the village to live and aren't farmers. One policeman who lives in Gladestry who works in London which is 780 miles away. There is an accountant who works in Hay-on-Wye. There are builders who are mostly self-employed. There are people who have retired who mostly came from outside Gladestry. Of the 51 people we counted only 19(37%) are retired and 32 (62%) are working.
